Name: Parameter variation language
Summary: Cant describe how a designs parameters change between different design options
Affected_Aspects: UML;SysML V1;Capella Language;OPM Language;SDL;Valispace Language;RePoSyD Language;AADL;SLIM
Workaround: SysML- new stereotypes or product line engineering approach

Name: Topology variation language
Summary: Cant describe how a designs topology change between different design options
Affected_Aspects: UML;SysML V1;Capella Language;OPM Language;SDL;Valispace Language;RePoSyD Language;AADL;SLIM
Workaround: SysML- new stereotypes, needs tools support to generating new relationships

Name: Multiplicity variation language
Summary: Cant describe how a design elements multiplicity changes between different design options
Affected_Aspects: UML;SysML V1;Capella Language;OPM Language;SDL;Valispace Language;RePoSyD Language;AADL;SLIM
Workaround: SysML- can define multiplicity but not change this, however the definition can be flexible, e.g. 2* means at least two of something, this could be leveraged as a multiplicity constraint

Name: Element variation language
Summary: Cant describe how a design elements type changes between different design options
Affected_Aspects: UML;SysML V1;Capella Language;OPM Language;SDL;Valispace Language;RePoSyD Language;AADL;SLIM
Workaround: SysML- can define type but need tool support to change this automatically, also need new stereotypes or external ontology to describe the set of possible types

Name: Tool based variation
Summary: Cant switch between different design options
Workaround: SysML/ cameo simulation tool kit- could use instance specifications for parameter level variability

Name: Exploration  stage in methodology
Summary: No well defined stage at which exploration of design alternatives (in physical architecture) should take place
Workaround: Define new stage between logical/ functional architecture definition and physical architecture definition for exploration

Name: Identification of what aspects to vary and at what level
Summary: No well defined method for selecting aspects of a design to vary (apart from starting from nothing)
Workaround: Rule set for what elements can vary and how

Name: Simulation Time
Summary: It is expensive to do full system simulations for many design alternatives
Workaround: Reduce system model for simulation, e.g. surrogate model, multiscale model etc.

Name: Selection of designs
Summary: The designer cannot select the best design among many without rigorous metrics
Affected_Aspects: ARCADIA;OOSEM;RePoSyD;STRATA;OPM;Valispace;MOFLT;COMPASS;SEAM;TASTE Method;UML;SysML V1;Capella Language;OPM Language;SDL;Valispace Language;RePoSyD Language;AADL;SLIM
Workaround: Identify objectives that are evaluated for each design

Name: Synthesis of new alternatives
Summary: How can design be enumerated efficiently
Workaround: Rule based approach to describe how to pick/enumerate new designs

Name: Synthesis of NOVEL alternatives
Summary: How can an algorithmic process incorporate the same inventiveness of a human designer in synthesising new deign options
Workaround: Follow techniques that can encourage stochastics, e.g. ML, evolutionary

Name: Design Space Coverage
Summary: How the design space be as full explored as possible
